title: Its amazing!
review: The film keeps in suspense. impossible to tear off. acting is the highest praise ... one of the best films of 2018. will not leave anyone indifferent.

title: Worst DC film ever
review: It have not bad stylish look...But it cant save this film. It have a lot of stupid and inappropriate jokes. Batman looks like old,ilness dog,who always cry. Aquamen - alcoholic.Flash-crying kid who is afraid of everyone and everything. Robot (no matter about his name) - crying kid too. Only wonder woman and superman can make anything with badGUY. About badguy-who is he?Why he want to destroy earth?P.S Meet with the spartans looks much more better than this film)
